text:
Conveyancing Order 2012

I make the following order under section 3(2) of the Conveyancing Act 2004 .

20 December 2012

NICK MCKIM

Minister for Corrections and Consumer Protection

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Conveyancing Order 2012 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Application of Conveyancing Act 2004
    The application of the Conveyancing Act 2004 is extended to the following instruments prepared for the purposes of the Conveyancing and Law of Property Act 1884 :
            (a) contracts for the sale of land;
            (b) instruments amending contracts for the sale of land.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 December 2012

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
